title: Skin idea school themed Gnar
body: I throght since there appears to be a lack of skins a school themed {{champion:150}}  would be cool he could where a plane white shirt with a little red tie and just blue shorts. however when he transforms he gains the appearance of a american grid iron player. His q effect could be that he throws a ruler. and whilst raged he throws a foot ball, next his e could be that he uses a skipping rope to jump over enemy's and whilst rages he catches a foot boot/American foot ball/ his w in his rage form could be he performs a tackle and his  R would remain the same . I wish I was an artist so I could show what I'm thinking of however with a lack of skins I think this could fit in quite well  with the head master {{champion:114}}
